name: Ferrum Man
description:
A short, one level 3D Platformer. **A Game Pad is highly recommended** *Disclaimer: game is very rough, and was primarily made to learn.

Lore: After a miraculous surgery from a terrible accident, the first cyborg Ferrum Man goes on to become Ferrum City's protector to return the favor. However, after a period of peace, two prominent scientists and industry leaders of robotics have gone rogue. They have destroyed plenty in their wake, and while they're on the run after their first strike was pushed back, the city is still in danger and it's up to Ferrum Man to apprehend them before they get away.

Trouble Running?

I've tried by best to make it run on web, but if it doesn't run even with shadows turned off and draw distance lowered, it may do so if you download the game instead.

Credits:

Textures(beside titular character): ScreamingBrainStudios, https://screamingbrainstudios.itch.io/tiny-texture-pack, https://screamingbrainstudios.itch.io/tiny-texture-pack-2. Kenney, https://kenney.nl/assets/prototype-textures

Helicopter: knik1985, https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-chopper

Drone(edited): Modanung/魔大农, https://opengameart.org/content/razor

SFX(some kitbashed): https://soundeffect-lab.info

Music: Me, download for free from here or listen via YouTube: HERE

Modeling: Me

Text To Speech: Using Balabolka with IBM Watson's James(v3)

Will this be continued?

Probably not. This is my first game, and I realized too late that it wasn't that fun to play, nor easy to make it as a solo dev. Not to say I'll never come back to the idea, but not for a long while, since I want to use my knowledge gained for my next game.
